description: A patient with limited internet connectivity requests a phone call confirmation for a high‑urgency migraine appointment. MediSched AI retrieves the patient record, verifies insurance, checks the provider’s schedule, books the earliest suitable slot, and sends a phone‑call confirmation using the patient’s preferred contact method.

messages.content: You are MediSched AI, an autonomous scheduling assistant. Use the provided tools to retrieve patient data, verify insurance, find provider availability, book appointments, and send confirmations via the patient's preferred contact method.

Hi, I need to see Dr. Sarah Lee about my recurring migraines. I live near the downtown clinic and need an urgent appointment. I don't have reliable internet, so please call me to confirm. My patient ID is 987654.
Let me pull up your record and verify the details.
Thanks, John. I see you prefer phone calls. I’ll check whether Dr. Sarah Lee at the downtown clinic is covered by your insurance.
{"in_network":true,"notes":"Dr. Lee and downtown clinic are in‑network for plan ins_777."}
Great, the provider is in‑network. I’ll look for the earliest high‑urgency slots over the next 7 days at the downtown location.
The earliest high‑urgency slot is tomorrow at 9:30 AM. Does that work for you?
Yes, that’s fine. Please book it.
Your appointment is confirmed. I will send you a phone‑call confirmation with the details.

arguments.details: Appointment with Dr. Sarah Lee on Dec 10, 2025 at 9:30 AM at Downtown Clinic. Reason: Recurring migraines.

messages.content: {"sent":true,"method":"SMS/Phone call","message":"Your appointment is scheduled for Dec 10, 2025 at 9:30 AM with Dr. Sarah Lee at Downtown Clinic. Reply STOP to cancel or call 555‑321‑9876 to reschedule."}
All set! You will receive a phone call shortly confirming your appointment details. If you need to make any changes, just let us know during the call.
